ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rare Spawns with bard items (was: Lambent woes....  )
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye, E ci... Then again I have not spent a long time in the Warden s room, just kind of pass through on my way to lower...never came across him. There s too
ygData.messageBody:
Aye, E'ci...

Then again I have not spent a long time in the Warden's room, just kind of
pass through on my way to lower...never came across him.

There's too many zones in this game, you senior guys will probably lose
whatever respect you may have for me entirely but there are zones that I
have still never even set foot in yet and I am level 43. I have NEVER been
in solb or Permafrost, heh.

I've been on a kind of bard hiatus lately and rather that getting Faras up
to 50 I decided to get 5 secondary characters up to 10 to check out other
classes a bit.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 2:29 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....

> Damn, and you're on E'ci too aren't ya Faras? I haven't seen
> the squire
> either, but have "seen" the warden at least a dozen times.
> Speaking of
> troublesome spawns/drops, has anyone here ever seen an
> alligator skin? I
> must have killed 20 bull alligators in Innothoule this past
> week and no
> skins.
>
> What other ranged slot options are bards out there using
> besides Dragoon
> Dirk and Runed Bone Fork? I was looking to upgrade soon.
>
> Kit
